channel.title: case study on
channel.description: Recent content in case study on

item.title: [Case Study] Estimating Heat Transfer of a lake
item.description: Github link: https://github.com/thdngan/case-studies/tree/main/spline_heattransfer Background The grouping of something into various categories is known as stratification. When two kinds of steam that are at different temperatures come into contact, thermal stratification happens.

item.title: [Case Study] Greenhouse gases and rainwater
item.description: Github link: https://github.com/thdngan/case-studies Background: Several greenhouse gases have shown an increase in atmospheric concentration during the past 50 years, as is widely known.
